snippet: Representative Steve King’s troubles show the liability of a national profile built largely on Tea Party credentials and incendiary statements.
abstract: Iowa Republican Rep Steve King is in a tight race against Democratic opponent Christie Vilsack; King's troubles underscore the liability of a national profile built largely on Tea Party credentials and incendiary statements as candidates in newly drawn districts face an electorate tired of empty political talk and stalemate.

byline.contributor: Derek Willis contributed reporting from Washington.

lead_paragraph: Representative Steve King’s troubles show the liability of a national profile built largely on Tea Party credentials and incendiary statements.

headline.seo: Tough Tests for Steve King and Other Tea Party Favorites
headline.main: In Iowa and Beyond, Redrawn Districts Test Favorites of Tea Party
headline.print_headline: In Iowa and Beyond, Redrawn Districts Test Favorites of Tea Party
